trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_000_000<tab>I issue wares as rewards to those who contribute to the reconstruction effort. My apologies, but I am afraid I cannot accept gil.
TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_010_000<tab>Welcome, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>! You honor us with not only your presence, but your contribution besides!

TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_010_010<tab>Now, you may have heard that contributing to the cause earns you skybuilders' scrips. These may be brought here to be exchanged for a selection of wares.
TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_010_020<tab>In order to attract ever more contributors, we endeavor to expand the range of items offered.

TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_010_021<tab>We endeavor to expand the range of items offered, that we might continue to attract contributors, even now that the reconstruction effort itself has been completed.
TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_010_030<tab>Aside from donating items, you may also earn scrips by participating in concerted works. Have you been informed about these, perchance?
TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_010_040<tab>In which case, I urge you to have the details from Chief Foreman Augebert. Meanwhile, I shall look forward to exchanging many scrips for you!
TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_010_050<tab>Aside from donating items, you may also earn scrips by bringing materials gathered in the Diadem. Have you been informed about these, perchance?
TEXT_CTSHWDCURRENCYSHOP_00650_ENIE_010_060<tab>If not, Flotpassant will be able to furnish you with the particulars. Meanwhile, I shall look forward to exchanging many scrips for you!
